name: Knight Vs Zombies
description:
Knight vs zombies is a arcade zombie killing game where you control a knight killing a endless horde of zombies in a graveyard.

CONTROLS

- Move the mouse to move the camera

- Use the mouse left button to attack

- Use the space bar to jump

- Use the WASD tome the player

- Hold the SHIFT key to run

- Press ESC to pause the game

DEVELOPEMENT HISTORY

This game is a prototype made based on a idea I had for a 2D zombie killing arcade game, but as a way to improve and challenge myself I decided to make it as a 3D, since I had nerver tried to make a 3D game before.

I'm not sure if i'll revisit this prototype in the future, but i'm definitely going to continue making both 2D and 3D games.
